Package org.webpki.crypto

package org.webpki.crypto

Crypto - Cryptographic Algorithms and Utilities

  • Class
    Description
    AlgorithmPreferences
    The crypto library supports SKS and JOSE algorithms.
    AsymKeySignerInterface
    Common interface for asymmetric key signatures.
    AsymSignatureAlgorithms
    Asymmetric key signature algorithms.
    CertificateUtil
    X509 certificate related operations.
    ContentEncryptionAlgorithms
    JWE and COSE content encryption algorithms.
    CryptoAlgorithms
    Crypto algorithm base interface.
    CryptoException
    Wrapper for making the WebPKI crypto library only throw unchecked exceptions.
    CryptoRandom
    Support class to SecureRandom.
    EncryptionCore
    Core JOSE and COSE encryption support.
    EncryptionCore.AsymmetricEncryptionResult
    Return object for ECDH and RSA encryptions.
    EncryptionCore.SymmetricEncryptionResult
    Return object for symmetric key encryptions.
    HashAlgorithms
    Hash algorithms including an implementation.
    HmacAlgorithms
    HMAC algorithms including an implementation.
    HmacSignerInterface
    Common interface for HMAC signatures.
    HmacVerifierInterface
    Common interface for HMAC validation.
    KeyAlgorithms
    Asymmetric key algorithms.
    KeyEncryptionAlgorithms
    JWE and COSE key encryption algorithms.
    KeyTypes
    Basic key types.
    OkpSupport
    Support methods for "OKP" [RFC 8037].
    SignatureAlgorithms
    Common signature interface.
    SignatureWrapper
    Wrapper over Signature.
    X509SignerInterface
    Common interface for X509 signature creation.
    X509VerifierInterface
    Common interface for X509 signature validation.
